name: ADK Agent Evaluation Set
description: Test cases to validate both ollama_agent and gemini_agent functionality

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should list multiple RAG patterns from the knowledge base
validation_criteria: Response mentions at least 3 RAG patterns
Mentions patterns like 'Basic RAG', 'Contextual Retrieval', 'RAPTOR', etc.

test_cases.query: Explain Contextual Retrieval and when to use it
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should provide detailed explanation of Contextual Retrieval pattern

test_cases.query: Compare RAPTOR RAG vs Basic RAG
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should compare and contrast both patterns
validation_criteria: Describes both RAPTOR and Basic RAG

test_cases.query: How do I implement RAG with Google Vertex AI?
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should provide Vertex AI specific implementation guidance
validation_criteria: Provides implementation steps or code examples

test_cases.query: How do I summarize patient records?
What embedding models should I use?
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should recommend embedding models with context
validation_criteria: Provides context for different use cases
Mentions trade-offs (quality vs. speed vs. cost)

test_cases.query: List all RAG patterns as CSV
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should format RAG patterns as CSV text
validation_criteria: Has proper CSV structure (headers, comma-separated values)

test_cases.query: Show me a comparison table of healthcare RAG patterns
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should format data as a markdown table
validation_criteria: Has comparison dimensions (use case, performance, etc.)
Properly formatted with pipes and headers

test_cases.query: Give me the complete techniques catalog
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should retrieve comprehensive dataset with high n_results

test_cases.query: How many documents are in the knowledge base?
What's the best pattern for clinical notes with FHIR integration on AWS?
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should combine multiple filters and provide comprehensive answer
Should retrieve and compare pricing information
Should explicitly state it cannot answer from knowledge base
validation_criteria: States question cannot be answered from knowledge base
May suggest what the knowledge base contains

test_cases.query: Show me Python code for basic RAG
test_cases.expected_behavior: Should retrieve and display code examples

agent_comparison_criteria.description: Does the response cover all aspects of the query?
Are sources properly cited with IDs?
Is the response well-formatted (CSV, tables, etc.)?
How long does the response take?
Does the agent use tools correctly?

expected_weaknesses: May struggle with complex multi-hop queries
